conclusion_text.summary:
After Perusal of documents produced before me as per that the above Property House Situated at Saral No. 297, Ph No. 09,Village Chandwasa, Tehsil Shamgarh Distt. Mandsaur (M.P)admeasuring total Area 1600 Sq. ft. originally owned and possessed by Mr Dayaram Prajapati S/O Mr Mangilal Prajapati, R/O Chandwasa, Tehsil Shamgarh, Distt. Mandsaur (M.P) as recorded in Gram Panchayat Records in the name of Mr Dayaram Prajapati S/O Mr Mangilal Prajapati, R/O Chandwasa, Tehsil Shamgarh, Distt. Mandsaur (M.P)  .

 

Further the said Owner Mr Dayaram Prajapati S/O Mr Mangilal Prajapati, R/O Chandwasa, Tehsil Shamgarh, Distt. Mandsaur (M.P) declared his wife Smt. Bhagvanti Bai W/O Mr. Dayaram Prajapati, R/O Chandwasa, Tehsil Shamgarh, Distt. Mandsaur (M.P) as a co-owner of equal parts of the said Property House Situated at Saral No. 297, Ph No. 09,Village Chandwasa, Tehsil Shamgarh Distt. Mandsaur (M.P) admeasuring total Area 1600 Sq. ft. Vide Registered Co-ownership Deed No. MP249422023A12483685, dated 19/10/2023.

As per provision of Law, Mr Dayaram Prajapati S/O Mr Mangilal Prajapati and Smt. Bhagvanti Bai W/O Mr. Dayaram Prajapati are the legal title holder of the said property till today.

The said property is already Mortgaged in favor of Electronica Finance Ltd. except the charges of Electronica Finance Ltd The title is clear, marketable free from encumbrances and SARFAESI is applicable on the property
